pr_title: Added Overlay changes for missing faces renames

timeline.message: Added base files for creating overlay changes

timeline.bodyText: Why are changes necessary in the io.openliberty.thirdparty.faces-3.0/bnd.bnd? In addition you'll want to rebase on integration since I recently renamed el.4.0 to expressionLanguage.4.0
timeline.author: pnicolucci

replies.bodyText: Sounds good Ill rebase and make the changes. So when I added the overlay class and built the project I got some compilation errors which were resolved when pulling in those projects at the build path and thats why I added them. Not sure why it didnt hit some errors before
replies.author: isaacrivriv

replies.bodyText:
Ah ok looking at the third party bnd.bnd:
Export-Package: 
org.apache.myfaces.renderkit.html;thread-context=true;version=3.0.0, 
org.apache.myfaces.shared.config;version=3.0.0, 
org.apache.myfaces.shared.renderkit;version=3.0.0, 
org.apache.myfaces.shared.renderkit.html;version=3.0.0, 
org.apache.myfaces.shared.renderkit.html.util;version=3.0.0
So probably since we're now compiling a class in org.apache.myfaces.shared.renderkit.html since you have an overlay is why we needed these updates.
replies.author: pnicolucci

replies.bodyText: Made the changes to include the overlays in the core io.openliberty.org.apache.myfaces.3.0 bundle and then thirdparty pulls in the changes from the project which will then get the overlay. Tested locally and the updated to jakarta are being made this way
replies.author: isaacrivriv
